title: Login success with valid CPF and password
description: Verify that user can successfully login using valid CPF and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid CPF
Enter valid password
Click login button
Verify user is redirected to dashboard page

title: Login failure with invalid CPF
description: Verify that login fails when using an invalid CPF format or non-registered CPF.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid CPF format or unregistered CPF
Enter any password
Click login button
Verify login fails and an invalid credentials error message is shown

title: Password recovery flow works correctly
description: Verify that users are able to request password recovery and reset passwords securely.

steps.description: Navigate to password recovery page
Enter registered CPF or email for recovery
Submit recovery request
Confirm that recovery instructions are sent to user securely
Follow recovery link to reset password
Enter new valid password and confirm
Submit new password
Verify password has been successfully reset and user can login with new password

title: Logout terminates session properly
description: Verify logout functionality invalidates user session and redirects to login page.

steps.description: Login successfully to the system
Click logout button/link
Ensure session is terminated and user is redirected to login page

title: Dashboard data displays correctly for user
description: Verify that the dashboard shows relevant information and navigation options as per user role.

steps.description: Login as a regular employee
Verify dashboard page displays upcoming events, notifications, and quick links

title: Institutional agenda prevents double bookings
description: Validate that resource reservations for projectors and notebooks do not allow double booking for the same time slot.

steps.description: Login to agenda module
Reserve a projector for a specific date and time slot
Attempt to reserve the same projector for overlapping date and time slot
Verify reservation is blocked and appropriate message is shown to user

title: Resource reservation triggers automatic IT support ticket
description: Verify that when a hardware resource is reserved, an automatic IT support ticket is created and visible in Support system.

steps.description: Login and reserve a notebook resource via agenda
Confirm that an IT support ticket linked to the reservation is automatically created
Login to IT support module as IT staff
Verify that the new support ticket is visible and contains correct reservation details

title: HR module allows document upload and access control
description: Verify HR users can upload employee documents and access is properly restricted based on permissions.

steps.description: Login as HR user
Upload a new employee document in RH module
Confirm document upload succeeds and is linked to correct employee profile
Login as non-HR user
Attempt to access HR documents
Verify access is denied due to permissions

title: Digital time tracking clock-in with supervisor validation
description: Ensure employees can submit digital clock-ins that require supervisor validation and that status updates correctly.

steps.description: Login as employee and submit clock-in time via RH module
Verify submission status is 'Pending Validation'
Login as supervisor
Validate or reject employee's clock-in
Confirm status updates accordingly to 'Validated' or 'Rejected'

title: IT support ticket lifecycle management
description: Verify IT tickets can be created, updated, assigned, and resolved, with status properly reflected and visible to users and IT staff.

steps.description: Login as user and create new IT support ticket
Verify ticket is assigned unique ID and status is 'Open'
Login as IT staff
Assign ticket to self and update ticket status to 'In Progress'
Confirm ticket status change is saved and visible to all relevant users
Set ticket status to 'Resolved' and add resolution comments
Verify ticket resolution is logged and user is notified

title: Knowledge base article search and access control
description: Validate that users can search for technical articles in knowledge base and that access respects user roles.

steps.description: Login as generic user
Search knowledge base for a keyword
Verify search results are relevant and accessible
Attempt to access restricted articles (if any)
Confirm that restricted articles are blocked for unauthorized users

title: Education platform course enrollment and completion
description: Verify that users can browse course catalog, enroll in courses, watch lessons, take quizzes, and receive certificates upon successful completion.

steps.description: Login as a user
Navigate to education platform and browse course catalog
Enroll in a course
Access course lessons and complete them
Take associated quizzes/exams
Verify quizzes are graded correctly with pass/fail outcomes
Confirm that a certificate is generated automatically upon successful completion

title: Educational quiz failure handling
description: Verify that unsuccessful quiz attempts can be retaken and are handled correctly without granting certificates.

steps.description: Take an exam and fail
Verify no certificate is issued
Attempt to retake the quiz
Confirm retake is allowed

title: Maintenance request creation and status updates
description: Verify users can submit infrastructure and hospital equipment maintenance requests and can see up-to-date statuses.

steps.description: Login and navigate to maintenance module
Submit new maintenance request with required information
Verify that maintenance request is saved and assigned unique request ID
Update maintenance request status as maintenance team
Confirm that status updates are reflected in user view

title: Corporate communication mural displays recent announcements
description: Verify that the digital mural displays latest announcements properly and updates in timely manner.

steps.description: Post an announcement using mural admin interface
Access mural page as regular user
Validate that announcement appears correctly on mural

title: Inter-user messaging functionality
description: Verify that users can send, receive, and read private messages within the system.

steps.description: User A logs in and sends a message to User B
User B logs in and checks inbox
Verify User B receives the message with correct content and timestamp

title: Employee birthday listing displays accurate data
description: Verify that birthday listings show correct employee names and dates, updated monthly.

steps.description: Enter employee data with birthday information into system
Access birthday listing
Confirm listing shows all upcoming birthdays for current month accurately

title: Administration module enforces role-based permissions
description: Verify that actions in administration panel are restricted according to user roles and permissions.

steps.description: Login as administrator
Add, modify and delete users, sectors, and permissions
Verify changes are saved and audit log entries are recorded
Login as non-admin user
Attempt to access admin panel functions
Verify access denied and no admin changes can be made

title: Administration audit logs record all critical changes
description: Verify that all modifications in system settings, user management, and permissions are logged with user and timestamp.

steps.description: Login as admin and perform various configuration changes
Access audit logs page
Verify log entries correspond to changes made with accurate user and timestamp information

title: Digital library document access control
description: Verify that documents and manuals in the digital library are accessible only to authorized users.

steps.description: Upload documents to the digital library with specific access permissions
Login as authorized user and access documents
Confirm authorized user can view and download documents
Login as unauthorized user and attempt access
Verify access is denied and proper error message is displayed
